name: Commonwealth ex rel. Black, Appellant, v. Myers

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts,’ JJ.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Black, Appellant, v. Myers.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Black, Appellant, v. Myers.
Submitted November 9, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts,’ JJ.
March 22, 1966:
Lloyd, Black, appellant, in propria persona.
Gordon Gelfond and Joseph M. Smith, Assistant District Attorneys, F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Jr., First Assistant District Attorney, and James G. Grumlish, Jr., District Attorney, for appellee.
